content:
Managing your Task

To start using Resources effectively you'll need to first add a Quantity to this Task.

Click the 'Edit Task Details' button below to edit your Task, enter a Quantity then click 'Update' to save your changes.

Adding Resources to your Task

To start adding Resources, click the 'Add a Resource' button below.

You can search for a Resource by typing into the RESOURCE field shown in the pop-up window that appears.

Set your Quantity and Usage then click the 'Add Resource' button.

Managing your Suppliers

Now that you've added your first Resource, it's important you understand how Suppliers work.

Click the flashing Suppliers link above to begin.
